sqlMap.select: /* PrefImpDAO.selectListForImpGrid */ SELECT SEG_ID ,PREF_ID ,DATASET_ID ,VAL_ID ,IMP_ORDINAL ,PREF_VALUE ,IMP_VALUE ,PREF_TYPE ,USE_YN ,VAL_NM ,USE_YN as OLD_USE_YN , dbo.F_CODE_NM('PREF_TYPE', PREF_TYPE) AS PREF_TYPE_NM FROM WP2_PREF_IMP A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PREF_ID = #PREF_ID# ORDER BY A.IMP_ORDINAL
sqlMap.insert: /* PrefImpDAO.insert */ INSERT INTO WP2_PREF_IMP ( SEG_ID ,PREF_ID ,DATASET_ID ,VAL_ID ,IMP_ORDINAL ,PREF_VALUE ,IMP_VALUE ,PREF_TYPE ,USE_YN ,VAL_NM ) VALUES ( #SEG_ID# ,#PREF_ID# ,#DATASET_ID# ,#VAL_ID# ,#IMP_ORDINAL# ,#PREF_VALUE# ,#IMP_VALUE# ,#PREF_TYPE# ,#USE_YN# ,#VAL_NM# )
sqlMap.delete: /* PrefImpDAO.deleteByPrefId */ DELETE FROM WP2_PREF_IMP WHERE 1=1 AND PREF_ID = #PREF_ID#
